scenes.description: Applause and transition to MC segment.
MC section introducing Takane Lui and Shirogane Noel, preparing for a skit.

subtitles.original:
Habit
作詞：Fukase 作曲：Nakajin
subtitles.english:
Habit
Lyrics: Fukase Composition: Nakajin

subtitles.original: 君たちったら何でもかんでも分類、区別、ジャンル分けしたがる
subtitles.english:
You guys always want to classify, distinguish,
and categorize everything.

subtitles.original: 人はなぜか分類したがる習性があるとかないとか
subtitles.english:
People supposedly have an instinct to categorize,
whether that's true or not.

subtitles.original: この世の中には2種類の人間がいるとか言う君たちが標的
subtitles.english:
You who say there are two types of people
in this world are the targets.

subtitles.original: 持ってる奴と持ってない奴とか ちゃんとやる奴とやってない奴とか
subtitles.english:
Those who have and those who don't,
those who do it right and those who don't.

subtitles.original: 陰キャ陽キャ君ら分類しないとどうにも落ち着かない
subtitles.english:
Introverts, extroverts... you can't relax
unless you categorize them.

subtitles.original: 気付かない本能の外側を覗いていかない？気分が乗らない
subtitles.english:
Won't you look outside the instinct you don't
notice? You're not in the mood.

subtitles.original: つまりそれはそんなシンプルじゃない
subtitles.english: In other words, it's not that simple.

subtitles.original: もっと曖昧で繊細で不明瞭な何か
subtitles.english: Something more vague, delicate, and obscure.

subtitles.original: 例えば持ってるのに出せない奴 やってるのにイケない奴
subtitles.english:
For example, those who have it but can't show it,
those who do it but can't succeed.

subtitles.original: 持ってるのに悟ったフリしてスカしてるうちに不安になっちゃったりする奴
subtitles.english:
Those who have it but act enlightened,
only to become anxious while being smug.

subtitles.original: 所詮あんたはギフテッド 私は普通の主婦ですと
subtitles.english:
After all, you're gifted, while I'm just
a regular housewife.

subtitles.original: それは言い逃れ、素晴らしい逃げ、不可能の証明の加勢なんじゃない？
subtitles.english:
Isn't that an excuse, a great escape,
supporting the proof of impossibility?

subtitles.original: 夢を持てなんて言ってない そんな無責任になりはしない
subtitles.english:
I'm not saying to have a dream.
I won't be that irresponsible.

subtitles.original: ただその習性に喰われないで
subtitles.english: Just don't be consumed by that instinct.

subtitles.original: そんなハビット捨てるたび見えてくる君の価値
subtitles.english:
Every time you discard that habit,
your true value becomes visible.

subtitles.original: 俺たちだって動物 こういうのって好物
subtitles.english: We're animals too, and we love this kind of thing.

subtitles.original: ここまで言われたらドーパ、腹の底からコウブツブツ
subtitles.english:
After being told this much, dopamine peaks
and I'm grumbling from deep inside.

subtitles.original: 俺たちだって動物 ゆえに持つオリジナルな習性
subtitles.english:
We're animals too, hence we have our own
unique instincts.

subtitles.original: 自分で自分を分類するなよ 壊して見せろよそのバッド・ハビット
subtitles.english:
Don't categorize yourself.
Break that bad habit and show me.

subtitles.original: 壊して見せろよそのバッド・ハビット
subtitles.english: Break that bad habit and show me.

subtitles.original: 大人の俺が言っちゃいけないこと言っちゃうけど説教するってぶっちゃけ快楽
subtitles.english:
As an adult, I shouldn't say this,
but honestly, preaching is a pleasure.

subtitles.original: 酒の肴にすりゃもう傑作でも目的見失うきっかけ
subtitles.english:
It's a masterpiece when paired with drinks,
but it can cause you to lose sight of your goal.

subtitles.original: になれりゃそれはそれでウィンウィンじゃん
subtitles.english: If it becomes that, it's a win-win, isn't it?

subtitles.original: これってこれって残念じゃん
subtitles.english: Isn't this, isn't this just unfortunate?

subtitles.original: そもそもそれって君次第だし
subtitles.english: In the first place, that's up to you.

subtitles.original: その後なんか俺興味ないわけ
subtitles.english: I'm not interested in what happens after.

subtitles.original: この先君はどうしたい？って人に問われること自体
subtitles.english:
Being asked 'What do you want to do now?'
by others in itself...

subtitles.original: 終わりじゃないと信じたいけどそうじゃなきゃかなり非常事態
subtitles.english:
I want to believe it's not the end,
but otherwise, it's quite an emergency.

subtitles.original: 君たちがその分類された普通の箱で燻ってるからさ
subtitles.english:
Because you guys are smoldering
in those categorized 'normal' boxes.

subtitles.original: 俺は人生イージーモードずっとそこで眠っててやりなよ
subtitles.english:
My life is on easy mode. Just stay asleep
there forever.

subtitles.original: 俺はそもそもスペックが低いだから足掻いて藻掻いて醜く吠えた
subtitles.english:
My specs were low to begin with, so I struggled,
writhed, and howled uglily.

subtitles.original: 俺のあの頃を分類したら誰の目から見ても明らか
subtitles.english:
If you categorized me back then,
it would be obvious to anyone's eyes.

subtitles.original: すぐ世の中金だとか愛だとか運だとか縁だとか
subtitles.english:
Immediately saying the world is about money,
love, luck, or destiny.

subtitles.original: わずか二文字で片付けちゃうの
subtitles.english: Sorting it out with just a few characters.

subtitles.original: 俺たちはもっと曖昧で
subtitles.english: We are much more vague,

subtitles.original: 複雑で不明瞭な何か
subtitles.english: complex, and obscure things.

subtitles.original: 悟ったフリして奢るなよ
subtitles.english: Don't be arrogant by acting enlightened.

subtitles.original: 君に君を分類する能力なんてない
subtitles.english: You don't have the ability to categorize yourself.

subtitles.original: 俺たちだって動物 こういうのって好物
subtitles.english: We're animals too, and we love this kind of thing.

subtitles.original: ここまで言われたらドーパ、腹の底からコウブツブツ
subtitles.english:
After being told this much, dopamine peaks
and I'm grumbling from deep inside.

subtitles.original: 俺たちだって動物 ゆえに持つオリジナルな習性
subtitles.english:
We're animals too, hence we have our own
unique instincts.

subtitles.original: 自分で自分を分類するなよ 壊して見せろよそのバッド・ハビット
subtitles.english:
Don't categorize yourself.
Break that bad habit and show me.

subtitles.original: 俺たちだって動物 こういうのって好物
subtitles.english: We're animals too, and we love this kind of thing.

subtitles.original: ここまで言われたらドーパ、腹の底からコウブツブツ
subtitles.english:
After being told this much, dopamine peaks
and I'm grumbling from deep inside.

subtitles.original: 俺たちだって動物 ゆえに持つオリジナルな習性
subtitles.english:
We're animals too, hence we have our own
unique instincts.

subtitles.original: 自分で自分を分類するなよ 壊して見せろよそのバッド・ハビット
subtitles.english:
Don't categorize yourself.
Break that bad habit and show me.

subtitles.original: 壊して見せろよそのバッド・ハビット
subtitles.english: Break that bad habit and show me.

subtitles.original: 次のゲストは！
subtitles.english: The next guests are...

subtitles.original: ルイちゃん！ノエルちゃん！カモーン！
subtitles.english: Lui-chan! Noel-chan! Come on!

subtitles.original: どーもー！お邪魔します！
subtitles.english: Hello! Pardon the intrusion!

subtitles.original: 3周年おめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: Happy 3rd anniversary!

subtitles.original: おめでとー！ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Congrats! Thank you!

subtitles.original: ということで、この3人で今日はコントをね、やらせていただきたいなと思います！
subtitles.english:
So, the three of us would like to
perform a skit today!

subtitles.original: タイトル名言ってもいいですか？
subtitles.english: Can I say the title?

subtitles.original: はい、お願いします。
subtitles.english: Yes, please.

subtitles.original: タイトル名、「シナジーなし」。
subtitles.english: The title is... "No Synergy".

subtitles.original: なんでやねん！あるだろ！あるだろうよ！
subtitles.english:
What the heck! We have it!
We have synergy!
